fullplot: Elisabeth leaves her abusive and drunken husband Rolf, she packs her bags, takes the kids and goes to her brother Gèran. The year is 1975 and Gèran lives in a commune called Together. Living in this leftist commune are people between the ages of 25 and 35, along with their children. It is there where most of the film takes place, and there where things happen that affect not only the extended family members, but a few more...
plot: Elisabeth leaves her abusive and drunken husband Rolf, she packs her bags, takes the kids and goes to her brother Gèran. The year is 1975 and Gèran lives in a commune called Together. ...
title: Together

tomatoes.consensus: Managing to be both satirical and warm-hearted in its look at the inhabitants of a commune, Together successfully captures the spirit of a time.
